description:
The project is titled 'SHAMIYANA APP'. 

This project aims to create an app for Shamiyana Cafe that would help customers to order food online and reduce the time and hassle of ordering food. Additionally, the web portal would enable the cafe to manage the orders easily. Skills used includes Flutter, Dart, Firebase. The project uses Flutter, Dart, Firebase. The project is titled 'RAPID'. 

RAPID is a web app that enables users to play games like chess with their friends over a one to one video call using WebSockets and WebRTC APIs for realtime communication and video call features respectively. Skills used includes NodeJS, ExpressJS, Socket.IO, WebRTC, HTML, CSS, JS, Docker. The project uses NodeJS, ExpressJS, Socket.IO, WebRTC, HTML, CSS, JS, Docker. The project is titled 'SMART SENSING MIDDLEWARE'. 

This project aims to develop a web application that collects data from smart home devices and visualizes it in the form of graphs for analysis and understanding. The application will enable users to monitor and analyze data from their smart home devices in an intuitive and easy to use manner. Skills used includes ReactJS, HTML, CSS. The project uses ReactJS, HTML, CSS.
